search.query: | rest /services/configs/conf-analyticstories | where annotations!="" | spath input=annotations path=mitre_attack{} output=mitre_attack | eval rule_name=ltrim(title,"savedsearch://") | eval drilldownfilter = $mitre_technique_name$ | where mitre_attack = drilldownfilter | fields rule_name,mitre_attack,drilldownfilter | join rule_name [ | rest services/configs/conf-savedsearches | eval rule_name=title | eval rule_disabled=disabled | eval rule_name=ltrim(title,"savedsearch://") | table rule_name,rule_disabled ] | mvexpand mitre_attack | where mitre_attack = drilldownfilter | eval Status = if(rule_disabled=0,"Enabled","Disabled") | rename rule_name as "Rule Name", mitre_attack as Technique | fields Technique, "Rule Name", Status
